"The Guardians & the Maiden's Power":
"In order to fight Shiva on fair footing,
<%me> & Matoi visit Sukuna-hime
and inform her of their idea.
With her involvement, the
Guardians set out to the Sealed Grounds,
to fulfill the plan.
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
